skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: Core programming language for interactive browser-based applications.

skills.title: React.js
skills.description: A modern JavaScript library for building component-based user interfaces.

skills.title: Node.js

profile.title: Profile
aboutMe: Hi! I’m Birçe. Thanks to my passion for software, I combined my law career with technology.
For me, building clean, effective and user-friendly interfaces is not just a job, it’s also an art.

projects.title: Burger Bonanza
projects.description: A restaurant website built with React, utilizing basic page transitions and component structure. It is responsive and provides a user-friendly interface, demonstrating fundamental front-end development skills.

projects.title: Flight Radar
projects.description: A simple application that displays flight information. Dynamically presents flight data fetched from an API to the user. The user interface is built with basic React component structure.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A basic to-do list application with CRUD functionality. Users can add, edit, delete, and manage the status of tasks. Developed using React component structure and state management.

projects.title: VoyagerVerse
projects.description: Voyagerverse is an interactive information website built using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a responsive design enriched with user-friendly animations. This project has won an award in a web design competition.

footer.contact: Let's work together on your next product.

thanksPage.title: Thanks!
